content: Both #netherlands and #uk indicated that packages would be publicly available, if we'd like to host test servers ourselves. See https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179181-netherlands/topic/FHIR.20Connectathon.2029/near/265900572 and https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179189-uk/topic/FHIR.20Connectathon.2029/near/265821683. Thoughts?
I remember @Jens Villadsen advertised a branch of the HAPI server that has SMART included, in a past Nordics on FHIR call.
I did - I myself won't bring it to the connectathon as I'll be busy on the Vulcan/Gravitate track. If anyone else wan'ts to try it out, then give me a ping.
@Mikael Rinnetmäki :point_up:
